ModSettings.name: Call of the Wild
ModSettings.title: [Spell] Call of the Wild
ModSettings.description:
Inspired by DLC1, this is a lower level battle-cast summoning that the Nature realm otherwise lacked.
Summons one of the following random creatures onto the battlefield for use by the caster: - Two War Bears - A Boar - A Fat Rat
The overall intent was to provide the Nature realm a little more early-game play options.
ModSettings.author: DorianGray
